title:
LK 2 Pack for Google Pixel 8 Screen Protector with 2 Pack Camera Lens Protector, HD Ultra-thin, 9H Hardness Tempered Glass Screen Protector for Pixel 8; fingerprint Compatible; Military-grade shatterproof; screen protection and camera lens protection;
original visual experience; high-response haptic touch
descriptions:
Meet the LK 2 Pack Screen Protector + 2 Pack Camera Lens Protector for Google Pixel 8—the slim, crystal-clear armor your Pixel deserves.

Why you’ll love it:
- Crystal-clear HD view: Ultra-thin tempered glass preserves your phone’s original, vibrant display with zero rainbowing or haze.
- Military‑grade protection: 9H hardness with edge-strengthening design resists scratches, drops, and daily wear while staying shatterproof.
- Smooth, responsive touch: High-response haptic touch keeps gestures, typing, and gaming buttery-smooth.
- Fingerprint compatible: Works seamlessly with your Pixel 8’s fingerprint features for fast, reliable unlocks.
- Camera clarity protected: 9H lens protectors shield against scratches and cracks without compromising photo quality, color accuracy, or night shots.
- Easy, bubble-free install: Comes with all installation accessories for a quick, clean setup on the first try.
- Built to last: Durable, precise fit designed specifically for Google Pixel 8.

What’s in the box:
- 2x Tempered Glass Screen Protectors
- 2x Tempered Glass Camera Lens Protectors
- Installation accessories

Peace of mind, guaranteed:
- Lifetime Service with 24-hour customer support.

Keep your Pixel 8 looking pristine and performing flawlessly—without adding bulk. Choose LK and enjoy premium protection with a truly original visual experience.
